comments:
In BIRT 2.3M3 it is impossible to enter a query in the UI. When you try to create a new dataset, after selecting the datasource and the datasetname (next, finish), an error appears with "Query was Empty", "the statement doesn't return a resultset object".

Click "OK"
"Output colums" is selected; when you click "Query", nothing happens.

Hi There,

can you include the exact build number of your BIRT build?

Thanks.
Lin

Since we cannot reproduce the bug you described, would you please to attach the report design file here?

Thanks,
Xiaoxiao

Or you should provide the error log and tell what kind of the data source you defined in this report.

Thanks,
Xiaoxiao

Oke, after updating the DTP to 1.6M3 it worked... So BIRT 2.3 requires the DTP1.6
